verbose_text: Moreover, in this study, transfection of HEI-OC1 cells with miR-29b mimic suppressed the expression of SIRT1 and PGC-1alpha, while the knockdown of miR-29b significantly upregulated the mRNA level and protein expression of SIRT1 and PGC-1alpha.
evidence: level and protein expression of SIRT1 and PGC-1alpha
